DWFToolkit::DWFXPackageWriter::DWFXUndeclaredResourceReceiver

DWFToolkit::DWFXPackageWriter::DWFXUndeclaredResourceReceiver Class Reference

#include <DWFXPackageWriter.h>

Collaboration diagram for DWFToolkit::DWFXPackageWriter::DWFXUndeclaredResourceReceiver:

[legend]
List of all members.

Detailed Description

Implements a receiver for raw resources that should be added to the container. A provider will call this object for each resource to be provided. These resources will not be added to the manifest / descriptor hierarchy, but simply as a file in the package.
